body: Hi all! i have some problem in setting the mechanical ventilation on my workflow. Even if i input 3 ach (as you can see from the following screenshot) When i check the eso file i don't have constant value in the output "Zone mechanical ventilation air change per hour". why? any suggestion? PS Have you changed something on the new update version regarding the ventilation? Because before i haven't got this issue! Thanks a lot in advance Claudia [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/rnXnbo8QfWutkwO8mJNKTelAplcj22p6JrQsYS7YtESP7NYVrPivRVxlAeeNjO8c3qtbtTT-D2D2eRc3LItThW9-baiTI63O/2.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/rnXnbo8QfWtRObLOG5DccCoQkICAXuE7bgxx5-p621S7OcyFv9bvdx*OdXBdw3QHUVpdp62o-rzLum-E3Bd5qWAXIY2W7bwK/1.PNG)
